page.title: 14LIVE-AID CONCERT
page.content: In October 1984 a film report of the starving people of Ethiopia stunned the people of the world. Children and grown-ups were dying in their 1000's because of the famine in their country.People all over the world responded by raising money to help provide food and shelter to those who were suffering. Bob Geldof,a Pop-Star, decided to raise money by getting singers to sing a song. The group was named Band-Aid and the song was "Do they know its christmas?". American Pop stars made a similar record. The records were such a big success, raising lots of money, Bob Geldof arranged a World-Wide Pop Concert, with the American Groups. The concert was watched on TV by millions of people and raised Â£50,000 000. Bob Geldof was very pleased.
